title: HELP ID this small type
content:
I’ve been unsuccessful thus far at identifying the type in this small image. Any help is appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [prescription.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080115101919/http:/typophile.com/files/prescription.gif) | 4.89 KB |

 [‹ (x) serif text face in Paul Rand book by Heller - Bodoni Antiqua {Linda Cunningham}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080115101919/http:/typophile.com/node/32754 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Nicolas Sarkozy/Segolène Royal campaign type - Kontrapunkt, Frutiger {Jongseong, Vincent Le Moign (self)} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080115101919/http:/typophile.com/node/32748 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lkoniell

comments.content: Possibly Copperplate Gothic or Engravers Gothic. Awfully hard to tell at that size.

I thought it was Frutiger.

Edit: just to clarify, using OS X’s zoom feature I don’t see the petit-serifs that are part of Copperplate...
